author: mmusich
body:
Title says it all, needed for `cmssw` PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47418.
Streamer files have been prepared with [this script](https://github.com/mmusich/hltScripts/blob/511b36ed11294251e5891fb0a5066635677f6ea3/dqm/recreate-streamers_forOnlineBeamSpotMonitor.sh).
title: Add streamers for `onlinebeammonitor` unit test
